name: BEASTLY (itch) (SamuraiDev)
description:
Your car breaks down in the middle of winter, and you are left with the choice of dying from hypothermia in the freezing weather, or entering a large abandoned mansion.

(Music is copyright-free, I made it)

THIS IS EARLY ACCESS. THERE ARE MANY VISUAL AND SOUND BUGS.

Controls and Instructions…

Simple controls:

- WASD to move. 

— Hold SPACE to sprint. 

— E to interact. 

— M to open your map.

— Hold Q for 3 seconds to search furniture.

— Press R to knock on doors and scare the Hide-Behind away. Be careful: This summons the Grundell to your floor.

Simple instructions:

Find 3 fuses hidden around the house, power the metal door, and unlock it with a key. Then, you can finally escape.

There is 1 hiding place on each level, where you can find refuge when being chased. These take the form of beds and wardrobes. Most other furniture can be searched.

The Beasts:

— The Grundell

A corpse taken over by a powerful parasitic creature, slowly increasing in power as it takes victims.

— The Hide-Behind

A tall and slender mythical cryptid that hides behind doors to absorb its victims.

— The Jumping-Jaw

A beast infesting a dead body in order to catch its victims by surprise.

Tips!

— Knock on a door and quickly go to another floor to lure the Grundell away!

— Always wait at a door to hear if the Hide-Behind is there.

— Keep note of your location – knowing the nearest safe room or hiding spot can save your life!
